item.title: 'Just evil': Top Republican details Russia's 'horrific' mass abductions of Ukrainian children
item.description: Rep. Michael McCaul, former chair of the House Foreign Affairs Committee, is working to raise awareness about Ukrainian children taken into Russia.

item.title: 'Flooding the zone': Trump hits warp speed in first week back in office

item.title: Republicans react to Pete Hegseth's confirmation as defense secretary: 'He is the change agent'

item.title: McConnell voted no on Hegseth as Pentagon head, forcing Vance to cast tiebreaker
item.description: Sen. Mitch McConnell was one of three Republicans to vote against Pete Hegseth, who was narrowly confirmed as President Donald Trump's defense secreta...

item.title: Kristi Noem beats Senate confirmation hurdle, advancing to final vote for DHS role
item.description: Kristi Noem cleared a key procedural hurdle in the Senate on Friday, teeing up her final confirmation vote for early Sunday.
